title: Diamond Dazzle Bangles - Kanganalu with Modern Flair
materials: G-H Color). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Delicate and modern bangle design featuring alternating pear and square-shaped diamond settings. A minimalist take on traditional gold bangles, suitable for everyday elegance or stacking with other bangles. The open-setting allows maximum light to reflect through the diamonds, enhancing their brilliance.
colors: Yellow Gold and brilliant white Diamonds.
occasions: modern festive celebrations. Suitable as a gift for anniversaries
or graduations. Can be paired with sarees or modern attire for a touch of sophistication.
description: Combines the timeless appeal of gold with the modern sparkle of diamonds. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and resistance to tarnish. A versatile piece that complements both traditional and contemporary wardrobes. Each diamond is hand-selected for its brilliance and clarity.
